meanings.definition: The central point or middle of something.
meanings.sent1: The nombrils of the clock show the exact time.
meanings.sent2: She placed the sticker right in the nombrils of the notebook.
meanings.sent3: The nombrils of the maze led them straight to the prize.
meanings.sent4: His speech was the nombrils of the event, captivating everyone.
meanings.sent5: The nombrils of the story revealed the hidden truth.

meanings.sent1: The baby giggled when his nombrils was tickled.
meanings.sent2: She got a cute piercing on her nombrils.
meanings.sent3: The nombrils of the statue was polished to a shine.
meanings.sent4: Her nombrils was like a tiny dimple on her stomach.
meanings.sent5: The nombrils of the dancer moved gracefully with each step.
